tools.name: create_bucket
tools.description: Create a new bucket in Nutanix Object Store. Bucket names must be unique, lowercase, 3-63 characters.

bucket_name.description: Name of the bucket to create. If not provided, generates a unique name.

examples: Create a new bucket for logs

tools.name: list_buckets
tools.description: List all buckets in the Nutanix Object Store with their creation dates.

tools.name: list_objects
tools.description: List objects in a bucket with their keys and sizes. Supports prefix filtering.

bucket_name.description: Name of the bucket to list objects from

prefix.description: Optional prefix to filter objects (like a folder path)

max_keys.description: Maximum number of objects to return (default: 1000)

examples: Show files in the backups bucket

tools.name: put_object
tools.description: Upload a text object to a bucket. For binary/large files, use the web UI upload.

bucket_name.description: Name of the bucket to upload to

key.description: Object key (filename/path) for the uploaded object

examples: Upload a file called 'test.txt' with content 'Hello World'
Create config.json in the settings bucket
Put a README in the docs bucket

tools.name: get_bucket_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific bucket including object count and total size.
examples: Show details for the logs bucket
How big is the backups bucket?

tools.name: delete_object
tools.description: Delete an object from a bucket.

tools.name: execute_sql
tools.description: Execute a SQL query on the object store metadata database for analytics. Supports SELECT queries on bucket and bucket_stats tables.
examples: Show me storage growth over the last week
How many objects were added today?

tools.name: get_object_stores
tools.description: Get all Object Store configurations from Prism Central including capacity, status, and configuration.

verify_ssl.description: Whether to verify SSL certificate (default: false)

tools.name: fetch_object_store_stats_v4
tools.description: Fetch real-time statistics for an object store using Prism Central v4 API. Supports time range queries for metrics like IOPS, throughput, capacity, and object counts.

object_store_ext_id.description: External ID (UUID) of the object store

select_stats.description: List of stats: totalObjectCount, totalBucketCount, totalCapacityBytes, usedCapacityBytes, readIops, writeIops, readThroughputBps, writeThroughputBps

examples: Get stats for object store in the last 24 hours
Show IOPS for the main object store today
What's the capacity usage trend this week?
Get throughput metrics for the last hour

tools.name: get_table_schema
tools.description: Get the schema (columns and types) for a specific database table.

table_name.description: Name of the table to describe

examples: Show schema for the alerts table

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: List all tables available in the analytics database.
examples: Show me what data I can query

tools.name: get_database_summary
tools.description: Get a summary of the entire database including all tables, their columns, and row counts.
examples: What data is available for analysis?
